summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 8 and 9, Block 8, Cowen's University Park Addition; the north 35 feet of Tract 4, Except the west 139 feet of Scheuermann's Garden Acre Tracts No. 2; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-336 and 17-263, respectively.
